name: Chicken Fajita Bowl
author: Erin Connolly
summary: Low-carb chicken fajita bowl with cauliflower rice.
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, diced
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chiles (such as RO*TEL®)
directions: Grease a grill pan with cooking spray
Season chicken with salt and pepper; place in the prepared pan
Cook and stir over medium heat until chicken is no longer pink, about 7 minutes
Heat a skillet over medium-high heat
Add onion and bell pepper slices; saute until slightly browned, about 5 minutes
Mix in diced tomatoes and cooked chicken
Cook until liquid is mostly evaporated, 2 to 3 minutes
Microwave cauliflower rice following package instructions for 5 minutes
Carefully open the package of cauliflower rice and divide between 2 bowls
Divide the chicken and vegetable mixture evenly between the bowls
Top with Cheddar cheese, avocado, salsa, and sour cream
